coreAttributes.name: arcane shortbow
coreAttributes.description: This shortbow is infused with a potent arcane enchantment, which, once the string is drawn back, extracts an arcane essence out of the user's aura, before converting it into a bolt of energy to be fired at the target.

hitDescriptions.hitText: Drawing back [npc.her] arcane shortbow and firing an ethereal arrow, [npc.name] [npc.verb(hit)] [npc2.name] right in the chest, causing [npc2.herHim] to gasp and stagger back from the blow.
[npc.Name] [npc.verb(use)] [npc.her] arcane shortbow to fire an ethereal arrow at [npc2.name], and [npc.verb(manage)] to [npc2.herHim] right in the chest!
[npc.Name] [npc.verb(aim)] at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] arcane shortbow and [npc.verb(let)] loose, sending an ethereal arrow to cut through the air and hit [npc2.herHim] right in the chest!
